title: Open SDG indicator configuration
description: This form will produce an indicator's configuration for your Open SDG implementation.

auto_progress_calculation.title: Automatic progress calculation
auto_progress_calculation.description: This setting can be toggled on to enable automatic progress calculation for the indicator.

composite_breakdown_label.title: Composite breakdown label
composite_breakdown_label.description: Used as a label for the COMPOSITE_BREAKDOWN column, if it appears in the indicator data.

computation_units.title: Unit of measurement
computation_units.description: Unit of measurement which displays below the indicator chart.

copyright.title: Copyright
copyright.description: Copyright which displays below the indicator chart.

data_footnote.title: Footnote
data_footnote.description: Footnote which displays below the indicator chart.

data_non_statistical.title: Non-statistical data
data_non_statistical.description: Whether the indicator is statistical (can be charted/graphed) or not.

data_notice_class.title: Data notice - class
data_notice_class.description: A CSS class to apply to the data notice for this indicator.

data_notice_heading.title: Data notice - heading
data_notice_heading.description: A title to display above the data notice for this indicator.

data_notice_text.title: Data notice - text
data_notice_text.description: Text to display as a data notice for this indicator, intended to contain very important information which site viewers must keep in mind when using the data provided.

data_show_map.title: Show map
data_show_map.description: Whether the indicator should display a Map tab.

data_start_values.title: Starting values
data_start_values.description: Disaggregation values for a an indicator to start with already selected

value.title: Value
value.description: The value in that field to pre-select.

embedded_feature_footer.title: Embedded feature - Footer
embedded_feature_footer.description: A footer that displays below the embedded feature. Only used with either embedded_feature_url or embedded_feature_html.

embedded_feature_html.title: Embedded feature - HTML
embedded_feature_html.description: Any HTML to display in another tab, after Chart/Table/etc.

embedded_feature_tab_title.title: Embedded feature - Tab Title
embedded_feature_tab_title.description: A title for the embedded feature tab (ie, Chart/Table/[this]). Only used with either embedded_feature_url or embedded_feature_html.

embedded_feature_title.title: Embedded feature - Title
embedded_feature_title.description: A title that displays above the embedded feature. Only used with either embedded_feature_url or embedded_feature_html.

embedded_feature_url.title: Embedded feature - URL
embedded_feature_url.description: Any URL to display as an iframe in another tab, after Chart/Table/etc.

expected_disaggregations.title: Expected disaggregations
expected_disaggregations.description: An optional list of disaggregations (ie, data column names) to use when calculating the disaggregation status statistics.

footer_fields.title: Footer fields
footer_fields.description: Additional arbitrary information to display beneath the graph/table.

graph_annotations.title: Graph annotations
graph_annotations.description: This can be used to add line annotations to the graph, such as target lines to show the progress towards the 2030 goal for an indicator.

value.title: Value
value.description: The value at which to draw the line. For horizontal lines, this number corresponds to your actual data. For vertical lines, this number should be between 0 (the left side of the chart) and the number of years minus 1 (the right side of the chart).

endValue.title: End value
endValue.description: Optionally add a different ending value for the line.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the annotation to be read by screenreaders.

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Whether the line will be vertical or horizontal.

label.title: Label
label.description: A text label for the annotation.

position.title: Position
position.description: Placement of the label along the line.

backgroundColor.title: Background color
backgroundColor.description: Background color for the label text.

borderColor.title: High-contrast line color
borderColor.description: The color of the line in high-contrast mode.

fontColor.title: High-contrast label color
fontColor.description: Color for the label text in high-contrast mode.

backgroundColor.title: High-contrast background color
backgroundColor.description: Background color for the label text in high-contrast mode.

graph_limits.title: Graph limits
graph_limits.description: A list of min/max limits controlling the lowest/highest values to be shown on the y-axis.

minimum.title: Minimum
minimum.description: Minimum value for the y axis.

maximum.title: Maximum
maximum.description: Maximum value for the y axis.

graph_series_breaks.title: Graph series breaks
graph_series_breaks.description: A list of series break (ie, a gap among the years) lines to display on the graph.

label_content.title: Label content
label_content.description: The text to display for this series break.

value.title: Value
value.description: The numeric value at which to place the series break. This number should be between 0 (the left side of the chart) and the number of years minus 1 (the right side of the chart).

graph_stacked_disaggregation.title: Stacked disaggregation
graph_stacked_disaggregation.description: This can be used with the bar graph type to place a certain disaggregation into the same stacked bars.

graph_target_lines.title: Graph target lines
graph_target_lines.description: A list of target lines to display on the graph.

label_content.title: Label content
label_content.description: The text to display for this target line.

value.title: Value
value.description: The numeric value at which to place the target line.

graph_title.title: Graph title
graph_title.description: The title that displays above the graph/chart.

graph_titles.title: Graph titles
graph_titles.description: As an alternative to `graph_title`, this can be used to set specific titles for particular units and/or series.

graph_type.title: Graph type
graph_type.description: What type of graph to use for the indicator.

graph_types.title: Graph types
graph_types.description: A more configurable version of 'graph_type' (singular), this setting is used if you would like the chart type to depend on the user-selected unit of measurement or series.

indicator_available.title: Indicator available
indicator_available.description: An optional sub-title for the indicator, which displays below the indicator name. Intended for cases where the available data is slightly different than the indicator name.

indicator_name.title: Indicator name
indicator_name.description: The name for the indicator, which displays at the top of the indicator page.

indicator_tabs.title: Indicator tabs
indicator_tabs.description: Assign content for the indicator tabs, if the override box is checked. Otherwise this indicator will use the assignments set in your site configuration.

override.title: Override site configuration
override.description: If checked, the site-wide indicator tab configuration will be ignored for this indicator.

tab_1.title: Tab 1
tab_1.description: What to display in the first tab

tab_2.title: Tab 2
tab_2.description: What to display in the second tab

tab_3.title: Tab 3
tab_3.description: What to display in the third tab

tab_4.title: Tab 4
tab_4.description: What to display in the fourth tab

national_geographical_coverage.title: National geographical coverage
national_geographical_coverage.description: A label used in the absence of any disaggregation.

page_content.title: Page content
page_content.description: Content which displays in the main content area of the indicator page.

permalink.title: Permalink
permalink.description: Overrides the normal path of the indicator page. Not recommended, execpt for 'standalone' indicators.

placeholder.title: Placeholder indicator
placeholder.description: Entering text here identifies this as a 'placeholder' indicator. The text will be displayed on the goal page, in place of a link to the indicator page.

precision.title: Precision rules
precision.description: Control the number of decimal places for data in this indicator.

progress_calculation_options.title: Progress calculation options
progress_calculation_options.description: These settings control the automatic selection of a progress status when auto_progress_calculation is toggle on.

base_year.title: Base year
base_year.description: Default: 2015. Base year with which to compare current progress.

direction.title: Direction
direction.description: The indicator's desired direction of progress -- towards more positive values or more negative values. Default: negative.

disaggregation.title: Disaggregations
disaggregation.description: Disaggregation(s) to include in the progress calculation from the provided series and/or unit if there is no headline. If more than one disaggregation is specified, a progress value is calculated for each specified disaggregation and the median is taken as the final progress value for the indicator.

value.title: Value
value.description: Name of sub-category within disaggregation column

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Default: None. Only applicable if the target is None. Cannot be zero. If direction is 'positive', this is the maximum possible ceiling for the indicator values. If direction is 'negative', this is the minimum possible floor for the indicator values.

target.title: Target
target.description: Default: None. Value required to achieve target. Cannot be zero -- a target of zero will be reset to 0.001.

target_year.title: Target year
target_year.description: Default: 2030. Year by which the target is expected to be achieved.

progress_status.title: Progress status
progress_status.description: Progress status level that can be manually specified by the user if auto_progress_calculation is false.

proxy.title: Proxy
proxy.description: Flag this indicator as being a 'proxy' for one of the global SDG indicators. Use 'proxy' to flag the entire indicator, or use 'both' to flag particular serieses.

proxy_series.title: Proxy serieses
proxy_series.description: If 'proxy' above is set to both, this is required in order to specify which serieses should be flagged as proxies.

publications.title: Publications
publications.description: This setting controls the content of the 'Related publications' tab. It can contain any number of publications. You may have much of this information in the indicator metadata, but this configuration is available to supplement the metadata with a more structured way to list multiple publications.

related_indicators.title: Related indicators
related_indicators.description: This setting controls the 'Related indicators' tab. Specify indicators by using their indicator numbers, such as: 1.1.1

reporting_status.title: Reporting status
reporting_status.description: The reporting status of the indicator.

sort.title: Sort order
sort.description: Override the default order in which this indicator is displayed in lists. This can be left blank, and it will be automatically determined.

sources.title: Sources
sources.description: This setting controls the content of the 'Sources' tab. It can contain any number sources. You may have much of this information in the metadata, but this configuration is available to supplement the metadata with a more structured way to list multiple sources.

standalone.title: Standalone indicator
standalone.description: Whether the indicator is standalone (separate from the SDGs) or not.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: An optional list of 'tags' to display under an indicator when it is listed on its goal page.

x_axis_label.title: X axis label
x_axis_label.description: A label beneath the X axis on charts. This overrides the same site configuration setting.
